statements: DELETE FROM medical_records WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM medical_records WHERE id = 101 AND insurance_provider = 'HealthFirst';
DELETE FROM medical_records WHERE patient_dob < '1990-01-01' AND fraudulent_claim = TRUE;
DELETE FROM insurance_claims WHERE insurance_provider = 'ABC Insurance';
DELETE FROM fraudulent_claims WHERE claim_status = 'Under Review';
DELETE FROM fraudulent_claims WHERE claim_id = 500 AND claim_amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM user_accounts WHERE access_level > 2 AND username = 'admin'
DELETE FROM medical_history WHERE patient_id = 101 AND diagnosis = 'Heart Disease';
